rules.natural: Provided that the drone completes the scan, the sprayer applies herbicide.
Assuming the filter is clogged, either the nozzle is blocked or, given that the power grid is not operational, the battery is low.
The filter is clogged or the tank is damaged.
Whenever the harvester is running, the power grid is operational.
In the event that the harvester is active, the power grid is operational.
If the drone is calibrated, then it is not the case that the sensor array is offline.
Either the drone is calibrated or the drone is recalibrated.
The soil is dry or the power grid is operational.
Provided that the soil is moist, the soil is not dry.
The soil is nutrient deficient or the soil is moist.
Whenever the lab analyzes a sample, the lab generates a report.
The lab analyzes a sample or the lab tests a sample.
Given that the lab tests a sample, either the soil is fertilized or the soil is not nutrient deficient.
Under the condition that the lab generates a report, either the soil is fertilized or the soil is not nutrient deficient.
Whenever the weather is clear, the weather is sunny.
Either the prediction is inaccurate, or if it is not the case that optimal conditions imply clear weather, then the forecast is faulty.
There is a manual override, or if it is not the case that the harvester not being running or active implies it is stalled, then the conveyor is overloaded.
If the autopilot is enabled, then the manual override is not engaged.
The autopilot is enabled or the autopilot is engaged.
The system verifies the route or the system confirms the route.
Whenever the system confirms the route, if the autopilot is engaged then the manual override is not engaged.
The AI calculates the yield or the AI estimates the yield.
If the AI estimates the yield, then, assuming the system verifies the route, whenever the autopilot is engaged, the manual override is not engaged.
Data is uploaded to the cloud or data syncs with the server.
In the event that data syncs with the server, then, assuming the AI calculates the yield, if the system verifies the route, provided the autopilot is engaged, the manual override is not engaged.

The data is lost, or, if data is uploaded to the cloud then, given that the AI calculates the yield, whenever the system verifies the route, under the condition that the autopilot is engaged, the manual override is not engaged.
If the sensor array detects a weed, then there is a navigation error or, provided the drone is recalibrated, the sensor array is not offline.
Whenever the control unit processes data, there is a navigation error or, if the drone is recalibrated, the sensor array is not offline.
Assuming the sprayer initiates treatment, the sensor array detects a weed.
If the sprayer applies herbicide, then the control unit processes data.
Provided that the drone scans the field, the sprayer initiates treatment.
The drone scans the field or the drone completes the scan.
If it is not the case that a damaged tank implies either a blocked nozzle or (a non-operational power grid implying a low battery), then the sprayer leaks.
Provided that the harvester is not running or active, it is not the case that the harvester is stalled.
If it is not the case that the statement "the harvester not being running or active implies it is stalled" implies the conveyor is overloaded, then the conveyor is jammed.
Under the condition that it is not true that the statement "the harvester not being running or active implies it is stalled" implies the conveyor is overloaded, then the conveyor is not jammed.
If the power grid is not operational, then the sensor array is offline.
If the power grid is not operational, then the conditions are optimal.
Assuming the power grid is not operational, the battery is not low.
Given that the power grid is not operational, the weather is not sunny.

The sensor array detects a weed or the control unit processes data.
There is a navigation error, or if the drone is recalibrated then the sensor array is not offline.
Provided that the drone is recalibrated, it is not the case that the sensor array is offline.
It is not the case that the sensor array is offline.
The power grid is operational.
If the tank is damaged, then either the nozzle is blocked or, under the condition that the power grid is not operational, the battery is low.

The power grid is operational.
Assuming it is not the case that the harvester not being running or active implies it is stalled, then the conveyor is overloaded.
If it is not the case that the harvester is running or active, then the harvester is stalled.
The harvester is running or the harvester is active.
The power grid is operational.
If the lab analyzes a sample, then either the soil is fertilized or the soil is not nutrient deficient.
The soil is fertilized or the soil is not nutrient deficient.
The soil is not nutrient deficient.
The soil is moist.
The soil is not dry.
The power grid is operational.
If it is not true that optimal conditions imply clear weather, then the forecast is faulty.
Assuming the conditions are optimal, the weather is clear.
If the conditions are optimal, then the weather is sunny.
Whenever the power grid is not operational, the weather is sunny.
The power grid is operational.

Provided that data is uploaded to the cloud, then, if the AI calculates the yield, under the condition that the system verifies the route, assuming the autopilot is engaged, the manual override is not engaged.
Under the condition that the AI calculates the yield, then, provided the system verifies the route, if the autopilot is engaged the manual override is not engaged.
If the system verifies the route, then, assuming the autopilot is engaged, the manual override is not engaged.
Provided that the autopilot is engaged, the manual override is not engaged.
The manual override is not engaged.
Assuming it is not the case that the harvester not being running or active implies it is stalled, then the conveyor is overloaded.
If it is not the case that the harvester is running or active, then the harvester is stalled.
The harvester is running or the harvester is active.
The power grid is operational.

(A10 → A8).natural: Provided that the drone completes the scan, the sprayer applies herbicide.

(A12 ∨ (¬G → A11)).natural: Either the nozzle is blocked, or if the power grid is not operational, then the battery is low.

(A13 → (A12 ∨ (¬G → A11))).natural: Assuming the filter is clogged, either the nozzle is blocked or, given that the power grid is not operational, the battery is low.

(A13 ∨ A14).natural: The filter is clogged or the tank is damaged.

(A14 → (A12 ∨ (¬G → A11))).natural: If the tank is damaged, then either the nozzle is blocked or, under the condition that the power grid is not operational, the battery is low.

(A16 → G).natural: Whenever the harvester is running, the power grid is operational.

(A16 ∨ A17).natural: The harvester is running or the harvester is active.

(A17 → G).natural: In the event that the harvester is active, the power grid is operational.

(A2 → ¬A1).natural: If the drone is calibrated, then it is not the case that the sensor array is offline.

(A2 ∨ A3).natural: Either the drone is calibrated or the drone is recalibrated.

(A21 ∨ G).natural: The soil is dry or the power grid is operational.

(A22 → ¬A21).natural: Provided that the soil is moist, the soil is not dry.

(A23 ∨ A22).natural: The soil is nutrient deficient or the soil is moist.

(A24 ∨ ¬A23).natural: The soil is fertilized or the soil is not nutrient deficient.

(A25 → (A24 ∨ ¬A23)).natural: If the lab analyzes a sample, then either the soil is fertilized or the soil is not nutrient deficient.

(A25 → A27).natural: Whenever the lab analyzes a sample, the lab generates a report.

(A25 ∨ A26).natural: The lab analyzes a sample or the lab tests a sample.

(A26 → (A24 ∨ ¬A23)).natural: Given that the lab tests a sample, either the soil is fertilized or the soil is not nutrient deficient.

(A27 → (A24 ∨ ¬A23)).natural: Under the condition that the lab generates a report, either the soil is fertilized or the soil is not nutrient deficient.

(A29 → A28).natural: If the conditions are optimal, then the weather is sunny.

(A29 → A30).natural: Assuming the conditions are optimal, the weather is clear.

(A3 → ¬A1).natural: Provided that the drone is recalibrated, it is not the case that the sensor array is offline.

(A30 → A28).natural: Whenever the weather is clear, the weather is sunny.

(A32 ∨ (¬(A29 → A30) → A31)).natural: Either the prediction is inaccurate, or if it is not the case that optimal conditions imply clear weather, then the forecast is faulty.

(A33 ∨ (¬(¬(A16 ∨ A17) → A18) → A19)).natural: There is a manual override, or if it is not the case that the harvester not being running or active implies it is stalled, then the conveyor is overloaded.

(A34 → ¬A33).natural: If the autopilot is enabled, then the manual override is not engaged.

(A34 ∨ A35).natural: The autopilot is enabled or the autopilot is engaged.

(A35 → ¬A33).natural: Provided that the autopilot is engaged, the manual override is not engaged.

(A36 → (A35 → ¬A33)).natural: If the system verifies the route, then, assuming the autopilot is engaged, the manual override is not engaged.

(A36 ∨ A37).natural: The system verifies the route or the system confirms the route.

(A37 → (A35 → ¬A33)).natural: Whenever the system confirms the route, if the autopilot is engaged then the manual override is not engaged.

(A38 → (A36 → (A35 → ¬A33))).natural: Under the condition that the AI calculates the yield, then, provided the system verifies the route, if the autopilot is engaged the manual override is not engaged.

(A38 ∨ A39).natural: The AI calculates the yield or the AI estimates the yield.

(A39 → (A36 → (A35 → ¬A33))).natural: If the AI estimates the yield, then, assuming the system verifies the route, whenever the autopilot is engaged, the manual override is not engaged.

(A4 ∨ (A3 → ¬A1)).natural: There is a navigation error, or if the drone is recalibrated then the sensor array is not offline.

(A40 → (A38 → (A36 → (A35 → ¬A33)))).natural: Provided that data is uploaded to the cloud, then, if the AI calculates the yield, under the condition that the system verifies the route, assuming the autopilot is engaged, the manual override is not engaged.

(A40 ∨ A41).natural: Data is uploaded to the cloud or data syncs with the server.

(A41 → (A38 → (A36 → (A35 → ¬A33)))).natural: In the event that data syncs with the server, then, assuming the AI calculates the yield, if the system verifies the route, provided the autopilot is engaged, the manual override is not engaged.

(A42 ∨ (A40 → (A38 → (A36 → (A35 → ¬A33).natural: The data is lost, or, if data is uploaded to the cloud then, given that the AI calculates the yield, whenever the system verifies the route, under the condition that the autopilot is engaged, the manual override is not engaged.

(A5 → (A4 ∨ (A3 → ¬A1))).natural: If the sensor array detects a weed, then there is a navigation error or, provided the drone is recalibrated, the sensor array is not offline.

(A5 ∨ A6).natural: The sensor array detects a weed or the control unit processes data.

(A6 → (A4 ∨ (A3 → ¬A1))).natural: Whenever the control unit processes data, there is a navigation error or, if the drone is recalibrated, the sensor array is not offline.

(A7 → A5).natural: Assuming the sprayer initiates treatment, the sensor array detects a weed.

(A7 ∨ A8).natural: The sprayer initiates treatment or the sprayer applies herbicide.

(A8 → A6).natural: If the sprayer applies herbicide, then the control unit processes data.

(A9 → A7).natural: Provided that the drone scans the field, the sprayer initiates treatment.

(A9 ∨ A10).natural: The drone scans the field or the drone completes the scan.

(¬(A14 → (A12 ∨ (¬G → A11))) → A15).natural: If it is not the case that a damaged tank implies either a blocked nozzle or (a non-operational power grid implying a low battery), then the sprayer leaks.

(¬(A16 ∨ A17) → A18).natural: If it is not the case that the harvester is running or active, then the harvester is stalled.

(¬(A16 ∨ A17) → ¬A18).natural: Provided that the harvester is not running or active, it is not the case that the harvester is stalled.

(¬(A29 → A30) → A31).natural: If it is not true that optimal conditions imply clear weather, then the forecast is faulty.

(¬(¬(A16 ∨ A17) → A18) → A19).natural: Assuming it is not the case that the harvester not being running or active implies it is stalled, then the conveyor is overloaded.

(¬(¬(¬(A16 ∨ A17) → A18) → A19) → A20).natural: If it is not the case that the statement "the harvester not being running or active implies it is stalled" implies the conveyor is overloaded, then the conveyor is jammed.

(¬(¬(¬(A16 ∨ A17) → A18) → A19) → ¬A20).natural: Under the condition that it is not true that the statement "the harvester not being running or active implies it is stalled" implies the conveyor is overloaded, then the conveyor is not jammed.

(¬G → A1).natural: If the power grid is not operational, then the sensor array is offline.

(¬G → A11).natural: Provided that the power grid is not operational, the battery is low.

(¬G → A28).natural: Whenever the power grid is not operational, the weather is sunny.

(¬G → A29).natural: If the power grid is not operational, then the conditions are optimal.

(¬G → ¬A11).natural: Assuming the power grid is not operational, the battery is not low.

(¬G → ¬A28).natural: Given that the power grid is not operational, the weather is not sunny.

¬A1.natural: It is not the case that the sensor array is offline.

¬A23.natural: The soil is not nutrient deficient.

¬A33.natural: The manual override is not engaged.
